00018 #include <stdlib.h>
00019 #include <csgapplication.h>
00020 
00021 using namespace std;
00022 using namespace votca::csg;
00023 
00024 class CsgDumpApp
00025     : public CsgApplication
00026 {
00027     string ProgramName() { return "csg_dump"; }
00028     void HelpText(ostream &out) { out << "Print atoms that are read from topology file to help"
00029         " debugging atom naming."; }
00030 
00031     bool EvaluateTopology(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref);
00032 };
00033 
00034 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00035 {
00036     CsgDumpApp app;
00037 
00038     return app.Exec(argc, argv);
00039 }
00040 
00041 bool CsgDumpApp::EvaluateTopology(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref)
00042 {
00043     MoleculeContainer::iterator mol;
00044     for (mol = top->Molecules().begin(); mol != top->Molecules().end(); ++mol) {
00045         cout << "molecule: " << (*mol)->getId() + 1 << " " << (*mol)->getName()
00046                 << " beads: " << (*mol)->BeadCount() << endl;
00047         for (int i = 0; i < (*mol)->BeadCount(); ++i) {
00048             cout << (*mol)->getBeadId(i) << " " <<
00049                     (*mol)->getBeadName(i) << " " << (*mol)->getBead(i)->getType()->getName() << endl;
00050         }
00051     }
00052     return true;
00053 }
